title: The Biggest Upgrade for Windows PCs in YEARS - Snapdragon X Elite
description: Between the Qualcomm Snapdragon X Elite for Windows laptops and Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 for Android flagships Snapdragon Summit 2023 had a lot to talk about.  Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:  Threads:
